name: Forgotten (itch) (Zillious)
description:
This is a free roam forest, it is only here for to play and see if there is any bugs, for example escaping out of the map, falling through the map itself, or just crashing.

If the ground is not loaded, reload the game and it should fix itself as i have not found why it happens but resetting works for me. 

WASD - movement

Left Shift - Run 

Left Mouse Click - Flashlight

Hope you have FUN, well for a walking sim at this point.
